quests_json.Quest.asia_8.step2: Great question, Axelâ€¦ I need some time to think about it.
quests_json.Quest.asia_8.step3: No need to hurry, we will continue our search for these cute creatures while you reflect.
quests_json.Quest.asia_9.step1: I know what my spirit animal is, Axel! And no, itâ€™s not a panda.
quests_json.Quest.asia_9.step3: You would be surprised, but it's probably a lion. I think I can qualify for being the king of the jungle after all Iâ€™ve been through lately. How about you?
quests_json.Quest.asia_9.step4: I loved your answer so much that I need to take the time to come up with an even better one!
quests_json.Quest.asia_11.step1: This garden is in a pretty dire state. I know weâ€™ve seen worse but do you think we can turn it around?
quests_json.Quest.asia_11.step2: If someone managed to build it in the first place, we have no excuse not to try and make it even better.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_1.step1: I canâ€™t believe my eyes! Finally!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_1.step2: Oh my god, Axel. You scared me. Whatâ€™s happening?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_1.step3: My best friend is back. This boomerang belongs to him. You got to help me find him!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_1.step4: First of all, I didnâ€™t know that you had a best friend and that he was gone. Secondly, Iâ€™ll need more information if you need my help.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_2.step1: Look, Lisa! Another confirmation that he is back.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_2.step2: Okay, Axel. I am happy to see you so excited, but who is he, and why was he gone?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_2.step3: Iâ€™ll explain everything, donâ€™t worry. Letâ€™s just find his next tool first!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step1: Alright, Axel. The deal is a deal. I am all ears!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step2: What can I say, Keoki is the guardian of the island. He was born and raised here, and he knows how to talk to the local spirits. At least he says that he knows.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step3: Sounds fascinating. I would really love to meet him.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_3.step4: Yeah, but first we have to find him.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_4.step1: Do you know where he went?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_4.step2: To look for your grandpa. He packed all of his tools and left the minute we realized that Archibald was missing. Thatâ€™s one of the reasons I am so excited to see him.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_4.step3: Do you think he might have something?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_4.step4: I donâ€™t know. But we will soon find out!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_5.step1: How did you become best friends?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_5.step2: When I came to the island, I knew no one and had nothing. He Gave me a roof under my head. Gave me the job. Introduced me to your grandpa.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_5.step3: He will be proud when he learns how you too helped me feel at home here.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_6.step1: Is Keoki friends with uncle Roger?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_6.step2: Of course, he is friends with everyone. You wonâ€™t be an exception. When he sits down and plays his drum everyone around fills with joy.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_7.step1: Why does this necklace look so familiar?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_7.step2: It is made of the similar gems we use to clear the island.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_7.step3: Oh, right! I hope Keoki will have something to say about the mysterious ways of the island.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_8.step1: I am not sure that the two of us will be able to carry all of these items around. And youâ€™re saying they all belong to one person?
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_8.step2: Yes. But to a very strong person who can easily carry the two of us around. Alongside all of his belongings.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_9.step1: Decided to make yourself the queen of the island? You had a good grip ever since you were a little girl!
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_9.step2: No, uncle Roger. Weâ€™re tracing Axelâ€™s best friend.
quests_json.Quest.gnomes_9.step3: Keoki is back? Why did nobody tell me?! Come on, let me help you!
quests_json.Quest.shark_1.step3: It looks like a bandage for animals.
quests_json.Quest.shark_1.step4: Oh, itâ€™s not mine. But I know exactly who lost it!
quests_json.Quest.shark_2.step2: What do you mean? This Thermometer looks pretty normal to me.
quests_json.Quest.shark_2.step3: We were supposed to find the owner of the bandage here. Not another one of her belongings.
quests_json.Quest.shark_2.step4: Who are we looking for exactly?
quests_json.Quest.shark_3.step1: So, who is the mysterious owner of these pretty self-explanatory things?
quests_json.Quest.shark_3.step2: Itâ€™s my girlfriend. My ex-girlfriend. She was very busy with her vet practice so we took a break. Now sheâ€™s missing and I am nervous.
quests_json.Quest.shark_3.step3: Donâ€™t worry! I know who might help us find her.
quests_json.Quest.shark_4.step1: How are you, aunt Gloria? Can I call you aunt Gloria?
quests_json.Quest.shark_4.step2: I am splendid, my dear. And yes, darling. You can call me anything you want!
quests_json.Quest.shark_4.step3: I hope youâ€™re done watering the plants because youâ€™re being invited to an adventure. As you can guess, weâ€™re looking for a local vet.
quests_json.Quest.shark_4.step4: Count me in, girls. If there is anyone who can find her, thatâ€™s us.
quests_json.Quest.shark_5.step1: Another clue! Do you think we can trace her back?
quests_json.Quest.shark_5.step2: It depends. When was the last time you saw her, Elena?
quests_json.Quest.shark_5.step3: At the dinner party thrown by Jenny a couple of weeks ago.
quests_json.Quest.shark_5.step4: Well, now we know where to dig further!
quests_json.Quest.shark_6.step1: Sorry, guys, I donâ€™t have anything ready to eat at the moment. But if you wait, I can put a few appetizers together.
quests_json.Quest.shark_6.step2: It might seem strange to you but we're not after your cooking skills. Weâ€™re looking for someone and we have a reason to believe that you might know where she is.
quests_json.Quest.shark_6.step3: Yes, I saw this syringe beforeâ€¦ And I know where Bethany is.
quests_json.Quest.shark_7.step1: So, Jenny, can you kindly tell us more about Bethâ€™s whereabouts? We keep on finding her belongings but not herâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.shark_7.step2: Just promise me that you will keep it to yourself. She cannot know that it was me who told you.
quests_json.Quest.shark_7.step3: Of course, your secret is safe with us.
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step1: When Archibald discovered a way to bring different creatures to life, he needed someone capable to take care of them.
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step2: Of courseâ€¦ Thatâ€™s why she was so busy all the time. And I thought that she didnâ€™t want to be together anymore.
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step3: But why did grandpa tell Beth about it but not uncle Roger? Or anyone elseâ€¦
quests_json.Quest.shark_8.step4: Actually, he also told meâ€¦ I am supposed to cook for the creatures.
quests_json.Quest.shark_9.step1: I must say it hurts to be the last one to know the truth.
quests_json.Quest.shark_9.step2: Donâ€™t be sad, darling. Archibald must have had his reasons. Maybe he was trying to protect you.
quests_json.Quest.shark_9.step4: I donâ€™t knowâ€¦ But there is something we should find out!
quests_json.Quest.fish_1.step1: Uncle Roger, I can't believe it! This compass has Grandpa's initials. Isn't this the one you gave him?
quests_json.Quest.fish_1.step2: Yes, it is! This find is extraordinary, Lisa. It means we're closer to uncovering the truth about his disappearance.
quests_json.Quest.fish_1.step3: We have to keep going. If we can find more of his belongings, we might finally solve the mystery surrounding Grandpa.
quests_json.Quest.fish_2.step1: Look, everyone! I found this old flask, and it has this strange symbol engraved on it. Do you think it's Grandpa Archibald's?
quests_json.Quest.fish_2.step2: That symbol... I've seen it in his journal before. What could it mean?
quests_json.Quest.fish_2.step3: Archibald did have a flask with a mysterious symbol. This could be a clue to the mystery surrounding his disappearance. We must keep going and stay vigilant!
quests_json.Quest.fish_3.step1: Hey, look at this fedora I found! It looks like something straight out of an adventure movie.
quests_json.Quest.fish_3.step2: Hold on, that fedora looks exactly like the one Grandpa Archibald used to wear! He was so proud of it. He always told me they should make a film based on him.
quests_json.Quest.fish_3.step3: Yes, that's Archibald's fedora alright! It seems our adventure is taking a fun twist. Keep your eyes peeled, everyone. We're onto something!
quests_json.Quest.fish_4.step1: Guys, look what I found wedged between the rocks during my morning hike! Did any of you lose it?
quests_json.Quest.fish_4.step2: I remember Archibald using a hammer like this on our expeditions. We must be retracing his steps. Let's see where this leads us!
quests_json.Quest.fish_5.step1: I believe we have found the essential item that will lead us to my grandpa!
quests_json.Quest.fish_5.step2: I know itâ€™s bad manners, but do you think we have every reason to read it without Archibaldâ€™s consent?
quests_json.Quest.fish_5.step3: Way ahead of you! "Day 45: I've stumbled upon an ancient secret that could change everything. I must proceed cautiously." This is incredible, team. Archibald was onto something big! We must follow his trail to uncover the truth.
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step1: This is unbelievable! I've found a map among the pages of Grandpa's journal.
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step2: A map? That's fascinating. It could be the key to solving the mystery!
quests_json.Quest.fish_6.step3: This looks like no ordinary map. There are cryptic symbols and markings. We'll need to decipher it to uncover Archibald's secrets and find out where he went.
quests_json.Quest.fish_7.step1: I found this flashlight on the ground. It seems like it's been here for a while.
quests_json.Quest.fish_7.step2: That looks like the flashlight Grandpa Archibald always carried with him on his adventures!
quests_json.Quest.fish_7.step3: Indeed, it does. It appears we're still on the right track. Let's keep following the map and stay prepared for whatever comes our way.
quests_json.Quest.fish_8.step1: Look, a rock climbing rope. It seems like someone used it to climb up the mountains.
quests_json.Quest.fish_8.step2: Grandpa was an expert climber. He must have left it behind. We should follow this path upwards.
quests_json.Quest.fish_9.step1: I found these binoculars on a rock ledge. They look like they've been here for a while.
quests_json.Quest.fish_9.step2: Those binoculars resemble the ones Grandpa used to have. He probably used them to survey the area. Maybe he was trying to find something important or keep an eye on something hidden.
quests_json.Quest.fish_9.step3: You're right. With the mysterious symbols on the map and the journal entry, it's clear Archibald was onto a big secret. His disappearance might be connected to whatever he was observing with these binoculars.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_1.step1: Roger, look what I've found! An ancient collar with symbols of the Canine Tribe.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_1.step2: The Canine Tribe? You mean like dogs and wolves?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_1.step3: Exactly! These creatures are known for their special abilities. Let's embark on a quest to find them!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step1: Look at this, Lisa! An egg with dog-like patterns and... are those ears?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step2: Fascinating! It resembles the eggs of the legendary Canine Tribe.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step3: The tribe from the island legends? The guardians of the ancient Canine Sanctuary?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_2.step4: Yes, exactly! If we've found this egg, they could be here on the island, in need of our help. We should investigate further.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_3.step1: This must be one of the canines from the ancient tribe. It's incredible!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_3.step2: This puppy could be the key to uncovering the mystery of the Canine Tribe. We should look after it and continue our exploration.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_3.step3: Absolutely! I'll take care of it while we find the rest of its family.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step1: Wow, this is a French Bulldog! I didn't expect to find one here.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step2: Maybe the Canine Tribe was more diverse than we thought. Perhaps they had connections with different breeds all over the world.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step3: This bulldog could have traveled far and wide before settling with the tribe. We're onto something big here.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_4.step4: I'll keep an eye on this little guy too. Let's see what else we can uncover about this tribe.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_5.step1: What an adorable Corgi! It's a breed famous for being the favorite of the British royalty.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_5.step2: So, the tribe was somehow connected to all these different places? Britain, France... It's becoming more intriguing.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_5.step3: Seems like our Canine Tribe had quite the global reach. There's more to this story than meets the eye.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_5.step4: Isn't it exciting? We're literally unearthing history here. Let's keep going!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step1: Look at this majestic Airedale Terrier, it's known as the 'King of Terriers' you know.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step2: King, huh? The tribe sure had a royal taste.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step3: I'm starting to see a pattern here. All these breeds are known for their distinctive features and roles in society.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_6.step4: There's definitely a grander tale to uncover. Each breed is a piece of the puzzle.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step1: A Golden Retriever! They're so friendly and intelligent.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step2: They were often used in search and rescue missions because of their keen sense of smell and tracking instincts.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step3: Perhaps the tribe had them as companions in their adventures and explorations around the island.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_7.step4: An island full of secrets, surrounded by mysteries, and watched over by loyal, intelligent dogs. Fascinating...
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step1: This breed is a Sheepdog, they're known for their herding skills. But what would they herd here?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step2: Perhaps the tribe bred them to keep the island's wild animals in check.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step3: Or maybe they were the tribe's companions, providing protection.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_8.step4: Whatever the reason, it seems they were integral to the tribe's life here. The mystery deepens...
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step1: Look at this Dalmatian! The spots are so distinctive. But I can't recall any legends about them.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step2: Perhaps the tribe admired their unique markings, or there might be a deeper symbolic meaning we're yet to uncover.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step3: Well, let's keep our eyes open for any clues. Each discovery brings us closer to understanding the tribe's connection with these animals.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_9.step4: And closer to revealing the true purpose of our quest. I can't wait to uncover more!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_10.step1: A hyena? That's an odd choice. I thought we were dealing with domestic canines.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_10.step2: True, hyenas are more distantly related, but they still have a place in the canine family tree. Perhaps the tribe saw their unique social structure and communication skills as something to admire.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_10.step3: Or maybe they appreciated their resilience and adaptability. Hyenas can survive in a variety of habitats and are formidable hunters.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_10.step4: Either way, they were important enough to be included in this quest. Let's keep going, we are on the brink of a major discovery!
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step1: This too must be a piece of the puzzle, despite its abandoned look.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step2: According to the legend, there was an ancient Canine Resort. A sanctuary where all the canines lived in harmony with the tribe.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step3: It seems the tribe had a deep connection with the canines, they respected them, even revered them. This resort was not just a home, but a place of unity.
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step4: Apparently, it's up to us now to restore this sanctuary and continue their legacy. Are you ready, team?
quests_json.Quest.warcraft_12.step5: We're more than ready, let's get to work!
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step1: These earrings look familiar... Oh no, Grandpa. Tell me it's not what I think it is. I beg you!
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step2: I am sorry, Lisa. Vivienne deserved to know that I was back. She said she will come visit us on the island but I didn't expect it to happen so soon.
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step3: Um, who's Vivienne? And who brings such fancy earrings to a tropical island?
quests_json.Quest.panda_1.step4: Exactly! And now it seems like she's lost. Classic Vivienne. Now I have to find her despite the fact that I have about an infinity other things that I would better do...
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step1: Is that...lipstick? I didn't know anyone on the island wore such vibrant colors!
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step2: Well, Marina, my granddaughter Vivienne is anything but ordinary. She enjoys standing out, and she would certainly stand out here on the island.
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step3: Another granddaughter, Archibald? I've never heard of her before.
quests_json.Quest.panda_2.step4: That's because Vivienne and I don't... we don't get along too well. But she's still family. We need to find her.
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step1: A makeup case? Now, that's a peculiar item to find in the jungle. More peculiar for it to belong to a Whitlock.
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step2: Indeed, Roger. That's my Vivienne. Always making a statement. I suppose even in the middle of a tropical island she wants to ensure her makeup is perfect.
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step3: This sounds like someone I would like to meet. A dash of glamour could certainly make things around here more interesting.
quests_json.Quest.panda_3.step4: Let's just find her quickly. Knowing Vivienne, she's probably in some kind of trouble already...
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step1: Are these... designer sunglasses? They must be Vivienne's. I can't imagine anyone else on this island who would need them.
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step2: That's Vivienne for you. Never seen without her sunglasses, even indoors.
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step3: It's just one of her little quirks. But if she's lost them, she can't be far. We need to keep looking.
quests_json.Quest.panda_4.step4: It's like a tropical version of a glamorous scavenger hunt. I kind of like it!
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step1: Wow, this lei necklace is beautiful. It's got some fancy designer tag on it. I bet it's Vivienne's.
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step2: Typical Vivienne... Can't even wear a simple flower necklace without it being branded.
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step3: Now, Lisa, remember your manners. Vivienne might not share your... simplicity, but she's still family.
quests_json.Quest.panda_5.step4: I remember very well, Grandpa. That's the problem.
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step1: Well, this hat certainly stands out. A designer piece too. I wonder who the owner is...
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step2: Her excessive love for fashion... It's always been her thing.
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step3: Each to their own, Lisa. Your sister finds joy in fashion, just as you do in exploring. It doesn't make her any less.
quests_json.Quest.panda_6.step4: If only she understood that as well as you do, Grandpa.
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step1: Archibald, can I speak to you in private while others examine this phone? What's this tension between Lisa and Vivienne?
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step2: Well, Axel, there's a lot of history there. When they were kids, Vivienne was always the charming one, the social butterfly. Lisa was more introverted, dedicated to her studies. That created...a rivalry of sorts.
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step3: I see... And I suppose Vivienne showing up out of the blue doesn't help.
quests_json.Quest.panda_7.step4: No, it doesn't. But I believe they will figure it out. After all, they're family.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step1: Those are definitely Vivienne's... she always had a flair for fancy footwear. Even when coming to a tropical island.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step2: I think they're cool, Aunt Lisa. I mean, a little over the top for here, but still stylish.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step3: It's not about the sandals, Marina... It's about her showing up uninvited and causing a stir.
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step4: I get it, Aunt Lisa. Family stuff can be complicated. But maybe Aunt Vivienne has changed?
quests_json.Quest.panda_8.step5: I really hope so, Marina. I really do.
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step1: Look what I found! It's... well, I'm not sure what it is. It's made of nice materials, though!
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step3: A hand-bag? But why would anyone need to carry their hands in a bag?
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step4: No, Keoki, it's a bag for carrying things in. Like a backpack, but usually for smaller items.
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step5: Ah, I see! Still, it seems very small. I could not fit many coconuts in there.
quests_json.Quest.panda_9.step6: It's not for coconuts, Keoki. Though, knowing Vivienne, she may have tried that once.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_1.step1: This egg is unlike anything we've seen before. The intricate patterns don't match any local species.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_1.step2: You're right, Lisa. It could indicate a new, unknown species. Let's continue investigating.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step1: How fascinating, a Kookaburra! You wouldn't typically find these birds here.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step2: True. Not just that, it has a medallion. Similar to those we've found on other animals. But why?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_2.step3: This medallion... Could it be related to grandpa's research? We should ask him, he might know something about this.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step1: Here we are again with another creature that's got one of those medallions. This time it's a Bilby.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step2: Our new friends seem to carry the same medallions, and if my investigative intuition serves me right, they aren't just ornamental pieces. They might be carrying a piece of a larger puzzle.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step3: Indeed, Bruce. I believe these medallions are a sort of bridge from their homeland to ours. Each one could represent a virtue from their world that they're here to share.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_3.step4: Grandpa, you mean they're like ambassadors? That's fascinating! Let's see what we can learn from them and help them in their mission.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step1: Check this out, another newcomer! This is a Numbat. And would you look at that, it has a medallion too.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step2: A Numbat, fascinating. These animals and their medallions are here for a reason. They're linked in some way.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step3: Archibald, you seem to know a lot about these medallions. Have you encountered them before?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_4.step4: A long time ago, yes. I believe these medallions are keys, bridges even. We should pay close attention to these creatures and what they might teach us.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step1: This one is an Echidna, and it also carries a medallion. Grandpa, what's the connection here?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step2: I designed these medallions, Lisa, as a link between two distant realms. I thought I could bridge the gap, but I became lost in the process.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step3: So, these animals, they're travelers like you?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_5.step4: Exactly, Bethany. And we should do our best to learn from them and make them feel welcome while they're here.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step1: A Platypus! With a medallion no less. Archibald, how do we assist these travellers?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step2: Well, Marcel, it starts with understanding. Observe them, learn from them. These creatures are full of wisdom.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step3: And look, the medallions resonate with each other. They're stronger together, like us.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_6.step4: Very true, Elena. We must strive to unite their virtues, just as they unite us.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_7.step1: Wow, a Wombat now! Just look at it, so peculiar and yet so endearing.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_7.step2: Not just that, Lisa. Notice its medallion? It's resonating just like the others. They're forming some kind of a sequence.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_7.step3: Indeed, they are Bruce. The sequence is the key to deciphering the language of their realm. Keep going, my friends. You're on the right path.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step1: Woah, look at the vibrant colors on that Cockatoo! Almost outshines my surfboard!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step2: You'd do well to learn more than just its colors, Marina. It's a complex creature.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_8.step3: Elena is correct. It carries another piece of the puzzle, as do all these unique creatures. Remember, we must respect and learn from them, just as I did during my time in their realm.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step1: A Koala! Its medallion feels... different. More potent, somehow.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step2: Good observation, Lisa. Each medallion grows stronger, reflecting the growing bond between our worlds. We're approaching a significant breakthrough. We must press on.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_9.step3: Indeed. There's more to these cuddly creatures than meets the eye.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step1: This Emu looks majestic! But its medallion... feels almost electric.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step2: Yes, the medallions are reacting more as we get closer to fulfilling the prophecy. It's a sign of progress.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_10.step3: We've come a long way. And to think, it all started with a strange egg!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step1: Hey, everyone, look at this. It looks like an Oasis, but it's empty... and it's in terrible shape.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step2: Hm... Feels like it's been abandoned. But why? Who could've left a place like this to wither?
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step3: I'm afraid only a thorough renovation will give us the answers we seek. Whatever this place once was, it carries the weight of the past.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step4: And maybe, it's up to us to breathe life back into it! Who knows what secrets it might reveal!
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step5: Agreed, we should make it our mission to restore this place. It might be a long process, but I'm sure it will be worth it.
quests_json.Quest.steampunk_12.step6: Then it's decided. Let's roll up our sleeves and bring this place back to its former glory. Let the adventure continue!

rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step1: Wow! Just look at it. This castle is so big. Itâ€™s so easy to get lostâ€¦ and the fog doesnâ€™t help!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step2: This is exactly what happened to princess Eleonora! And this brave prince embarked on a journey to find her.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoll_3.step3: We canâ€™t just stand and watch him do it alone. Letâ€™s help!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step1: Where does this pleasant aroma come from?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step2: I think those are the fragrances from the princessâ€™ collection.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step3: If she can smell them too it will help her find the way back to her chambers.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpperfume_3.step4: Great idea, letâ€™s find the rest and try it!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcandle_3.step1: I think if we get more of these candelabras we will have enough light to see the princess even in the darkest corners of the castle.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcandle_3.step2: This is the best idea weâ€™ve had so far!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step1: One thing the princess canâ€™t live without is her jewelry.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step2: No wonderâ€¦ It's so pretty and shiny.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpjewelry_3.step3: Shinyâ€¦ Of course! We can use it to signal the princess our location.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step1: Apparently, princessâ€™ hair possesses magic powers.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step2: Why doesn't she use it to find her way back?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcomb_3.step3: Sheâ€™s missing the hair brush required to activate them. If only we could find a way to bring it to herâ€¦
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpanimals_3.step1: You know what? I was thinking that if we canâ€™t get the job done it might not be such a bad idea to delegate it to our four-legged friends.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpanimals_3.step2: I am so desperate to find the princess so I am willing to try anything!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step1: Don't you have a feeling that this castle is one giant wardrobe? How many dresses are enough...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step2: This does not surprise me since we are in the princess' chambers. I bet your house is full of your things too.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step3: Yes. The only difference is that I don't have a handsome prince who is always ready to come to the rescue.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdress_3.step4: Speaking about the prince, letâ€™s find the rest of the garments and bring them to him.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step1: What a cute little creature. Did you ever dream about having a pet?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step2: Even if I did, it would not be a chameleon.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpchameleon_3.step4: It becomes impossible to find one when it mimics the surroundings. So once we have it, we should bring it to the prince before it disappears.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_1.step1: The princess must be somewhere nearby. This pan has her initials on it.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_1.step2: Itâ€™s a good sign. Letâ€™s keep looking!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_2.step1: What a wonderful cupcake! You can tell that the princess made it.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_2.step2: I guess cooking is just one of her many talents. Letâ€™s see what else we can find!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_3.step1: Do you think the princess left the lanterns behind so she can find her way back home?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_3.step2: Or so that we can trace her! Letâ€™s follow the lanterns. I am sure they will shed light on other clues.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_4.step1: Just look at this flower! Why is it glowing?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_4.step2: I think the princess is the right person to ask this question. Letâ€™s find her to get all the answers!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step1: Did you know that the princess loves to paint?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step2: I am not surprised. We saw her talents displayed before.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step3: I am starting to think that she painted this castleâ€¦
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_5.step4: I bet she regrets not drafting its map.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step1: Did you ever wonder what a princessâ€™ dress might look like?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step2: I am more curious if she made it herself.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step3: I think we saw enough evidence of her various skills. Sewing a dress, how hard can it be?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_6.step4: Letâ€™s make more and find out!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step1: We know that Eleonora is somewhere in the castle and that we can only find her if we all work together.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step2: That is indeed the case. If we manage to remove the fog and find all the clues, make no mistake, the princess will be saved.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7.step3: Alright then. Let's proceed with collecting the ingredients and see where we can find the first clue!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7_2.step1: It seems like this castle is still full of surprises!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7_2.step2: And the young princess here is kind enough to guide us through them. Are you ready for another adventure?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rprapunzel_7_2.step3: Sure I am! Let's split and find what else hides behind that fog!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step1: We haven't been properly introduced yet but we don't have time for pleasantries! The fate of the universe depends on you!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step2: What? Why? We're just passing by.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step3: I don't believe in accidents. You're here for a reason.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcentaur_0_2.step4: Alright, alright. What should we begin with?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_0.step1: If my calculations are correct, and they are, there is a meteorite coming our way. I know how to set it off course, but my telescope is missing a unique lens. I need your help with that.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_0.step2: Sounds easy enough. Just tell us where we can get the lens.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_0.step3: Get the lens? You can't just get it, we need to make it using the rarest materials and my patented technology. Just go to the mine. My minions are expecting you.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step1: Hey, guys. Your boss told us that we can collect some unique resources required to produce some unique lenses. Do you know anything about it?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step2: Of course, we've been learning to mine it for the longest time to stop the meteorite. The thing is...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step3: Let me guess, your partner is littered with stones? Don't feel bad, we've all been there.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_0.step4: Thanks. We would have to rescue him before we can rescue the world.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_1.step1: Thanks for saving me. I will have to check the breaks on our trolley but first let me return the favor by clearing that rubble.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_1.step2: It seems like time is of the essence here. So let's all work together to make things faster.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_2.step3: The trolley we use to collect the resources is broken.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_2.step4: Don't you worry about it. We're second to none when it comes to fixing things. It will be done lickety-split!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptrolley_3.step1: You weren't lying. You're good at fixing stuff. Well, let us show you how fast we can mine resources.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rppress_1.step1: It looks like the collapse affected the crane too. Do you have experience fixing heavy machinery?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rppress_1.step2: Do we have experience fixing heavy machinery? Please, we can fix anything even if it's not broken.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcrane_1.step1: Oh my god, Alvin will kill us! We've broken his press. Without it, we can produce lenses for the telescope.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcrane_1.step2: In that case, it might be the meteorite that kills you.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpcrane_1.step3: Don't worry, guys. It's an easy fix. We just need to find all the spare parts and work in tandem.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_0.step1: Why are all of the books piled up? Whoever did this clearly didn't understand what kind of treasure was in his possession.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_0.step2: Or maybe someone was trying to hide some other treasures they might have had. Let's clean this up and find out!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_1.step1: The books keep on coming our way. Maybe it's a sign that we should read more?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_1.step2: I think after we clean this mess up we will officially become the most well-read janitors in the world.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step1: Finally! No more books. It looks like we're done here.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step2: Aren't you curious to find out what hides behind this door?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step3: I am. But what if there are more books? I would not survive this.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_2.step4: I promise you, even if we stumble on just a page, we will immediately abandon this endeavor and indulge ourselves with something less sophisticated.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_3.step1: To be honest, I am scared to go inside.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpdoorway_3.step2: Don't be. Fortune favors the brave!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_1.step1: Have you seen the prince? I think he lost his gloves.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_1.step2: He went to get a gift for the princess to celebrate her return but got lost himself...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_1.step3: That's horrible! We must save him too.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_2.step1: Here comes the hat. We're getting closer.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_2.step2: I wouldn't get your hopes up. The castle is even bigger than we thought before...
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_3.step1: He wouldn't get too far without his boots, would he?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_3.step2: No, but what if he had a spare pair? As far as I am concerned, he can be anywhere so we should search every last corner.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_4.step1: Oh no, the poor prince lost his saber. What if he gets in trouble in the dungeon or something even worse happens?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_4.step2: In that case, we should probably try and find him as soon as possible rather than contemplating this misfortune.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_5.step1: The sight of this medal calms me down.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_5.step3: It's evidence of the fact that the prince can stand up for himself if it comes to that.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_5.step4: Still, we should hurry up to find him. Who knows what other secrets this castle might have?
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_6.step1: What a gorgeous doublet. I think we owe it to the prince to reunite him with it.
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rpprincehero_6.step2: I couldn't agree more. Let's hope that we are getting closer!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rapunzel2_chop.step1: Let's provide the princess with the ingredients so she could help us reveal the castle's secrets!
rapunzel_quests_json.Quest.rptelescope_open.step2: Let's keep looking. I have a feeling that we are going to find something very soon!

rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step1: We finally found our princess. Hooray!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step2: I would love to share your excitement but I donâ€™t think itâ€™s the princess. It might be her younger sister or her younger self.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step3: Her younger self? How is that possible?
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_6.rapunzel.step4: Do not forget that this castle is full of magic. Whoever this is, I am sure she can lead us to Eleonora!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step1: We did it! The princess is safe. And we make a great team!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step2: We always do. It just took you a trip to a magic castle to realize that.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step3: No, I always knew that. I just love to use every opportunity to remind everyone of it.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rprapunzel_7.rapunzel.step4: I hope youâ€™ll get another chance to do that on our next adventure!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoll_2.rapunzel.step2: I donâ€™t think so. Still looks like a doll.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoll_2.rapunzel.step3: A nicely made one. I hope it can help us get to the princess herself.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step1: Well done, guys. Sorry for being so rude before. I was just worried about the meteorite. But now we have everything to stop it.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step2: It was a team effort. Don't hesitate to ask if you need any help saving the world in the future. We enjoyed every minute of it!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step3: And maybe tell your guys to take it easy the next time.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rptelescope_1.rapunzel2.step4: Will do. If our paths ever cross again, I will consider myself very lucky.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoorway_4.rapunzel2.step1: So, what did I tell you?
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoorway_4.rapunzel2.step2: It's amazing! Looks like we've found a secret chamber.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpdoorway_4.rapunzel2.step3: Let's find the rest of our team and share the news!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_6.rapunzel2.step1: Look! It's a younger version of our prince.
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_6.rapunzel2.step2: Great. Let's take him back with us. Every young princess deserves to have a young prince!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_7.rapunzel2.step1: Thank god we found our prince!
rapunzel_unitStories_json.UnitStory.rpprincehero_7.rapunzel2.step2: Our job is done. Now, let's deliver him to the princess so they could take care of each other from now on and live happily ever after.

undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step1: A pair of flippers! Luckily we already know how to use them. Letâ€™s merge.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step2: Swimming is tiring, and I need food! Let's see if we can grow something underwater!
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step3: It worked! But I am starved just by looking at these apples! Let's try to harvest.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step4: It's a miracle! Let's see if it tastes like one.
undersea_json.Tutorial.undersea2.step5: Now I feel like exploring! Let's continue our journey.

unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_7.step1: Are you starting to fall in love with the island already?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_7.step2: Please, uncle Roger. I'll stay here only until we find grandpa. My city life is waiting for me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step1: Just look at it, Lizzy! Isnâ€™t it a testament to our perseverance and resilience?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step2: It looks to me just like a bunch of planks put together.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wood_9.step3: Itâ€™s much more than that. Give it time, and youâ€™ll learn to appreciate it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step1: Look at you, uncle Roger! Your contribution is invaluable.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_8.step2: Not at all, Lizzy. You're second to none. City girl yesterday, tropical goddess today!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step1: Does this look better to you than our cattle barn?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step2: I think this whole farm life on an island is starting to grow on me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.stone_10.step3: I knew it would! I think youâ€™re ready for your next project.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_8.step1: This thing is massive. But let me guess, still not big enough?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_8.step2: You are a quick learner. Don't worry, though. We're at the finish line.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step1: Isnâ€™t it amazing? Thanks for helping me out!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step2: No problem. You didnâ€™t know how to hold an axe the first time I saw you and now youâ€™re building barns.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.wagon_10.step3: Iâ€™m not sure why yet, but this place inspires me!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_2.step1: If this axe wasn't so heavy I would've picked it up myself because I'm losing my patience here...
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_2.step2: And for no good reason. We just need to find a couple more of these axes for their owner to reveal himself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step1: Axel, there you are. Weâ€™ve been looking everywhere for you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step2: Good to see you, Mr Hart. Who are we?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.king_3.step3: Me and Lizzy. Wait until you see her. Youâ€™re gonna love it!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step1: Canâ€™t we just call her and ask to come back home?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step2: way ahead of you, Lizzy. I already tried to reach Marina but sheâ€™s got no reception.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_5.step3: Then, I guess, finding her ourselves is the only option. Especially, since weâ€™re almost there!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step1: Grandpa, arenâ€™t you too old to walk that much? You couldâ€™ve just called.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step2: What is it with you girls and your phones? Check your signal the next time you go that far.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step3: Oops, sorry about that. Is there something I can help you with?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bear_6.step4: Yes. We are looking for Archibald. What was the last place you saw him?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_5.step1: This is it. Gloria must be somewhere near. She never leaves her watering can alone for too long.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.elf_5.step4: The fact that things didnâ€™t work out for you two despite you knowing her so well. Iâ€™m pretty sure that all is forgiven!

unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_21.step1: Iâ€™m so proud of you, Lizzy. Youâ€™re doing something truly meaningful. You and Archibald have so much in common.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_21.step2: Thank you, uncle Roger. It means a lot. Iâ€™m just happy that my grandpa was somehow able to discover the island without getting his ship to sink.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_21.step3: Thatâ€™s Archibald Whitlock. He always finds a way. And you will too!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_22.step1: I didnâ€™t have a chance to properly thank you for all the help.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_22.step2: Donâ€™t mention it, Lisa. We all want to find your grandpa as much as you do.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_22.step3: And now Iâ€™m sure that with your knowledge we will be able to do that no matter what!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step1: I know that nobody will share my feelings, but I donâ€™t want this quest with watercraft to end. Ever.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step2: Just make sure that your boat stays away from the portal.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step3: I am not even sure if it can go this far after all it has been throughâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_23.step4: Donâ€™t worry, weâ€™ll do our best to get you a new one after weâ€™re done here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_24.step1: Have you ever been on a cruise before?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_24.step2: I was too busy to live my life before I came back to the island.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_24.step3: I know that you have a lot on your plate at the moment, but maybe, just maybe, we can go on a trip together someday?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step1: We did it, guys! All the watercraft are saved. Great job, you all!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step2: Donâ€™t mention it, Lizzy. We would do anything for you and Archibald. I wish that we had our own Ocean Pearl that we could use to find your grandpa, wherever he might be.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step3: Why not keep the original one for a while? Who knows where else it can take us? In the meantime, Santa Cruz can start working on our own ship. How does "Tropical Pearl" sound to you?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.seabattlepass_25.step4: I can't wait to start already!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.kraken_0.step1: What is the oldest tradition here on the island?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.kraken_0.step2: Fishing, of course! We can use the tropical amulets to lure the fish and then trade it to get rewards.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.caravanship_0.step1: Would you be so kind and let me know when you see a ship full of exquisite exotic goods on the horizon?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.caravanship_0.step2: Umm, Iâ€™m seeing it right now. You didnâ€™t say it was that pretty.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.caravanship_0.step3: Hooray! The tropical carnival has finally reached us! We should hurry up and take advantage of the best offers!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_0.step1: Hey, Lizzy, did you grandpa like to watch movies?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_0.step2: His life was more exciting than most of the films, so I donâ€™t knowâ€¦ Why do you ask?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_0.step3: I found this Clapperboard and was wondering if it has something to do with Archibald.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_1.step1: Do you think one of his expeditions is on these reels?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_1.step2: Iâ€™m not sure. It can be anything. Letâ€™s keep looking and weâ€™ll find the answers!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step1: Uncle Roger, do you know if my grandpa used to make videos about his travels?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step2: Who, Archibald? Ha-ha-ha. He might be the greatest adventurer but he is awful with technology. This camera is for a local project.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_2.step4: Help me find more equipment and you will see for yourself.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_3.step2: Tropical cinema, if you will. You can click on it any time and exchange your views for a variety of great items!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.cinema_3.step3: Sounds lovely! Letâ€™s watch something and collect our rewards!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step1: Hey Lizzy, you know how the island prospered after your arrival? Well, I think itâ€™s time to take the next step.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step2: Oh, stop it, uncle Roger. Iâ€™m just doing the best I can. What are you suggesting?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step3: We already have the exchange, why not have the bank? It would be nice to get some tropical interest!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.bank_0.step4: What a great idea! Why didnâ€™t we think of it before? I'm already looking forward for all the benefits.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step1: Do you think this will work?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step2: Sometimes you just have to make the leap of faith and hope for the best. Even if no one replies, we still got each other. And we wonâ€™t stop until we find Archibald.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_9.step3: Thank you, Axel. Itâ€™s time to send some letters!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_10.step1: Excuse me, are you the local postman?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_10.step2: Indeed I am. I came to take your letters.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_10.step3: Do you by any chance know my grandpa, Archibald Whitlock?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.hunter_10.step4: Yes. He was the one who dispatched me here from Paris.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step1: You did not think that time stood still at the island, did you?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step2: How do you mean, Uncle Roger?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step3: We developed more efficient ways to merge while you were away. See for yourself with the hay!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fog_fog4_0.step4: Sounds exciting and intriguing, Uncle Roger. Watch me become the merge expert!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_9.step1: Oh my god, I thought all saber-toothed animals were extinct.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_9.step2: So did I. As it turns out, this island is even a more special place than we thought.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_9.step3: I wish Archibald could see it evolve and growâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step1: Just look at it! Isnâ€™t it beautiful?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step2: What a great job you did, guys. Thank you so much!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.lava_11.step3: Donâ€™t mention it, uncle Roger. Letâ€™s run to the store and get some cat litter!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_8.step1: And here is chefâ€™s hat! Can you find to whom it belongs, Bruce?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step1: Hi, Mrs. Oliver. We wanted to return your tools and ask you a few questions. If you donâ€™t mind.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step2: Wow, thank you, guys! Itâ€™s so nice of you. I guess they got lost during my move here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.centaur_9.step3: You moved here too recently? How interesting. So, do you mind the questions?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_9.step1: Look, uncle Roger. We found another dinosaur as per your request. Can you, please, tell us whatâ€™s happening now?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_9.step2: I think I found the reason behind Archibaldâ€™s disappearance. Letâ€™s finish what he started by building the Dinopark.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step1: Why do you think grandpa left? Was he scared of his own creation?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step2: Your grandpa is fearless. He just wanted to protect us and the island from the consequences of his discovery.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sand_11.step4: A way to recreate any creature. And I have a reason to believe that we will get another chance to test this hypothesis.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_9.step1: I believe we finally found what we were looking forâ€¦ You really are the greatest mind, Archibald!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_9.step2: Awesome! Dibs on dragon being my spiritual animal!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_9.step3: I still cannot wrap my head around this, but I canâ€™t wait to finish what my grandpa has started.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_11.step1: So, now we know the potential reason for Archibaldâ€™s disappearance. What should we do about it? And about all these fantastic creatures populating the island.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_11.step2: I can take care of the creatures, donâ€™t worry.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_11.step3: And I shall keep looking for my grandpa. Now I have even more reasons to do it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.asia_11.step4: Who said that you will do it alone? Weâ€™re a team, Lisa. We will follow you wherever you go.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_9.step1: Is Keoki the king of the island?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_9.step2: No, we are all equals here. He is just too big.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_9.step4: He means that Keoki is so massive no ordinary chair will be able to accommodate him without falling apart.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step1: It is really you, old friend. You have no idea how happy I am to see you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step2: Likewise, dear Axel. I am glad to be home. Give me a hug!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.gnomes_10.step4: Eventful to say the least. I have news. Something to discuss while sipping a tiki cocktail!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_9.step1: Well, it must be it. Bethany told me that she will travel with her dog. I really hope that you find the answers youâ€™re looking for.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_9.step2: Thank you for your help, Jenny. The creatures are very lucky that youâ€™re cooking for them!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_10.step1: Bethany! You have no idea how happy I am to see you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_10.step2: The feeling is mutual, Elena. I am glad that you found me.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_10.step3: My friend here has a couple of questions for you.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.shark_10.step4: Hi, Bethany! I am Lisa Whitlock, Archibaldâ€™s granddaughter and I could really use your help finding himâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step1: Would you be so kind as to tell us why are we back here? And aren't you supposed to recover after the surgery first?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step2: Please donâ€™t say that more ships have sunk.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_0.step3: Be patient, I will explain everything soon.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step1: Although the ships are fine, the underwater island itself needs to be taken care of.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step2: A few unnoticeable cracks have appeared since our last visit so we decided to erect our basecamp here. We have twenty days to do it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step3: Building an underwater station on such short notice sounds like a hard thing to do so I canâ€™t do it without you. Will you help me?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_1.step4: Of course! If there is one thing past experience taught us, it is that itâ€™s easier to carry heavy materials underwater than it is on land.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step1: Are you happy to be back? The local architecture looks very authentic.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step2: On the one hand, I just dried off from the last time. On the other one, I had a blast saving those ships.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step3: And they say that you canâ€™t walk into the same river twiceâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_2.step4: Technically, itâ€™s not a river. So we should be good!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_3.step1: Do you really think we can build our headquarters here? Saving sunken vessels is one thing, subaquatic construction is completely another.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_3.step2: I wouldnâ€™t have taken on this challenge if I hadnâ€™t had you by my side.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_3.step3: Itâ€™s good that the pressure feels different underwater. Otherwise, my hands would be shaking.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_4.step1: Will you consider moving here if the building turns out alright?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_4.step2: First of all, there are no ifs. It will be great! And secondly, why not? I can be the Gatekeeper of the Underwater.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_4.step3: You know what? This is probably the fanciest way to call a night watchman. Good for you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_5.step2: Everything is great. Weâ€™re making history here. All thanks to you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_5.step3: Donâ€™t thank me, thank your grandpa for all the blueprints.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step1: Iâ€™ve been thinking, what if we build an aquarium on our island and call it the Underwater quarters?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step2: Are you getting attached to the local fish?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step3: No. I donâ€™t know. Maybe a little bit.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_6.step4: Donâ€™t worry, you can always come and stay here whenever you feel like visiting them.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_7.step1: Do you find undersea construction easier? After all, the water is doing all the heavy lifting.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_7.step2: I always told you that if you work with your head, you can make things easier for yourself, land or water.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_7.step3: Anyway, I am glad that we were able to build this stunner so fast.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_8.step1: Are we still on schedule? I am not trying to push you. Just wondering if everything is going according to plan.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_8.step2: Let me run a few tests. This will help evaluate the progress.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_8.step3: Sure thing. The building does look great so I canâ€™t wait to see it finished!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_9.step1: Is everything okay? You look less cheerful than usual.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_9.step2: Everything is fine. At least for now. I have a reason to worry but it hasnâ€™t been confirmed yet. Just keep going, youâ€™re doing great!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_10.step1: Guys, I think we might have a problem.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_10.step3: I have a reason to believe that our materials arenâ€™t suitable for underwater construction.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_11.step1: I think you worry too much. The building looks just fine.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_11.step2: I ran some extended tests that showed that it will be washed out over time.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_11.step4: No. Weâ€™ve come too far already. I just need to find a way to alter the destruction process.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_12.step1: I must admit, I became attached to our base camp. And itâ€™s not even finished yet.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_12.step2: Me too. Do you think Santa Cruz will find a solution?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_12.step3: I hope so. He knows more about water than all of us combined. If he wonâ€™t, I don't know who will!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_13.step1: I heard of the problem, Santa Cruz. How are you doing?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_13.step2: News travels fast, Roger. Itâ€™s not my brightest moment but Iâ€™ll try my best to find the solution.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_13.step3: I have an idea. Letâ€™s gather the team to discuss it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step2: First of all, the building looks amazing.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step3: Thank you, uncle Roger. There is a caveat, thoughâ€¦
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_14.step4: I know. Thatâ€™s why we are all here. We must all do our best if we want to succeed.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step1: What are you suggesting, uncle Roger?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step2: I know that Santa Cruz is an expert in water but itâ€™s impossible to come up with the required solution while being here without the proper tools.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step3: He should go back to the island and work on the formula in your grandpaâ€™s office while I take over the construction in his stead.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_15.step4: Thank you, Roger. I promise not to come back without a solution!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_16.step1: I know that you're great, uncle Roger, but do you think we can manage without Santa Cruz?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_16.step2: I look at what you accomplished so far and do not doubt our success. Not even for a second! It can easily change, though, if we keep talking instead of working.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_17.step1: I can confirm that Santa Cruz has reached the island safely and buried himself in the office under books whose titles I canâ€™t even read.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_17.step2: Thanks for the update, Marina. Do you like what you see?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_17.step3: Let me put it this way, grandpa. It will be a tragedy if Santa Cruz doesnâ€™t find a solution.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_18.step1: Even if we canâ€™t find a way to make this building last forever, I really enjoyed constructing it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_18.step2: Agreed! But if justice exists, then it will prevail!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_19.step2: I am afraid not. Nobody has left or entered the office since we last spoke.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_19.step3: Alright then. This building deserves to be finished anyway. Letâ€™s make it the best we can. The rest is not up to us.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_20.step1: There is still work left to do but not that much time left. I think itâ€™s my turn to roll up my sleeves.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_20.step2: Are you sure? You know what the doctor said...
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_20.step3: Yes. I also know what my heart tells me and I will always listen to it while it keeps beating!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_21.step1: I canâ€™t believe my eyes! What are you doing? The doctor told you not to get involved in any activities.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_21.step2: I am just trying to be a part of the team. The greatest team Iâ€™ve had a chance to work with!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step1: Sorry to interrupt, grandpa. But there is news. News you would all like to hear.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step2: Itâ€™s better to be good, Marina. I was quite enjoying myself on the construction site. Look at that beauty!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_22.step3: Itâ€™s Santa Cruz! He is coming back as fast as he can.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step1: How do you like the news, guys?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step2: Itâ€™s great! Did he come up with a solution?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step3: This is something we have to hear from him.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_23.step4: Let's welcome him back with our best work, then!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_24.step1: Santa Cruz! Itâ€™s so good to see you. Even if this building turns to dust tomorrow.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_24.step2: I am happy to see you too. And donâ€™t you worry about the building. It took longer than I expected, but the formula is ready. We just need to apply it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step1: What a fantastic job, guys. All of you! I know that I said it a million times already, but youâ€™re the best team anyone can wish for.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step2: Thank you, uncle Roger! It feels good to be a part of it.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step3: And to work alongside a genius! How were you able to turn things around, Santa Cruz?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.sea2battlepass_25.step4: I donâ€™t want to bore you with the details. Letâ€™s just say that I had no option to fail since you were doing the best you can!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step1: I came across this old backpack hidden behind some bushes. It's filled with supplies and tools, even some old photographs and letters.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step2: This backpack must belong to Archibald. Judging by the contents, it seems he left it here intentionally, possibly as a final clue.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_9.step3: With all the items we've found, we must be very close to discovering Archibald's whereabouts. Let's keep moving forward and stay vigilant. Grandpa might just be around the corner!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step1: Grandpa Archibald! We finally found you!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step2: My dear Lisa, and all of you, I'm amazed you managed to follow the trail I left behind.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step3: It wasn't easy, Archibald, but we were determined to solve the mystery of your disappearance.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.fish_10.step4: I'm proud of all of you. But now that you're here, there's something you need to know. The secret I discovered, it's... it's something beyond our wildest imaginations, hidden right here on this island!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step1: A wolf, really? This tribe must've really respected the canine family. Wolves symbolize loyalty, intelligence, and are known as great communicators.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step2: They are also pack animals, just like us humans. They rely on each other to survive, just like we do on this island.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step3: Each canine we've discovered has been a step on this journey. I wonder what the final piece of this puzzle will be.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_10.step4: Whatever it is, I'm certain it will embody the unity and respect the tribe held for these creatures. Ready to find out?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step1: Just look at it now! The Canine Resort restored to its former glory, standing as a beacon of harmony and unity.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step2: You can almost hear the echoes of the past, the joyous barks and howls of the canines, the laughter of the tribe. We've done something truly special here.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step3: Aye, we have. This place is more than just a resort, it's a testament to a relationship that transcended species. A bond built on respect, trust and love.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step4: The legend of the tribe and their canine companions lives on through this place. And we'll make sure it's a story that continues to be told.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.warcraft_12.step5: Indeed, but this island still has many secrets to reveal. We've restored the Canine Resort, but who knows what's waiting for us next?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step1: The last medallion! We're so close to finally unlocking the secret.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step2: I can't believe grandpa, you were working on such an amazing project!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step3: It was my life's work, Lisa. And soon, we will see the fruits of that labor.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_10.step4: I wonder what will happen when we complete the collection!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step1: It's aâ€¦ It's an Oasis! All these animals, living together in harmony! This is amazing!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step2: Just like I'd hoped. A piece of their homeland, right here on our island.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step3: Aussie Oasis, huh? Fitting name. You really outdid yourself, Archibald.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step4: This was always the goal, my friends. To learn from each other and create a place of unity. Thank you all for helping bring this vision to life.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step5: You're right, grandpa! Itâ€™s all about unity and acceptance. Let's do our best to make these new friends feel at home.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.steampunk_12.step6: Couldnâ€™t agree more, Lisa. Well then, letâ€™s get started. Thereâ€™s so much to learn from them!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step1: This is... this is her dress. She was here!
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step2: Well, Lisa, it looks like Vivienne's trail is fresh. We should find her soon.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step3: Why does it feel like a storm is approaching, Grandpa?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step4: Because, my dear, storms often precede the arrival of Starlights.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step5: Well, let's hope this storm brings some rainbows with it too.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_9.step6: That's a nice way to put it, Axel. We sure could use a rainbow right about now.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step3: Vivienne, you've always had a flair for making an entrance.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step4: What's life without a little surprise, Grandpa?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step5: You sure have an interesting family, Archie.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step6: Well, Vivienne, now that you're here, we have a lot to discuss.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.panda_10.step7: I agree, Lisa. Let's put the past behind and start anew.
unitStories_json.UnitStory.thanksgiving_0.step1: Look at this! It is a new item! But how did it appear and what to do with it?
unitStories_json.UnitStory.thanksgiving_0.step2: This is a Thanksgiving item. Merge any objects from level two and above to receive Thanksgiving items, and when you collect all of them, you'll get a new unique landmark! Hurry up, time is limited!

xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step1: Are we sure that this is a Christmas Island? I expected a chorus of carols and the sparkle of festive lights, not this hush.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step2: Yes, it's peculiar. The usual joy of the season is missing, replaced by a stillness as if the island is holding its breath.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step3: What brings us here, then? We're wanderers of lands far and wide, but this silence... It's a riddle wrapped in tinsel.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step4: Maybe that's our purpose â€” to unwrap the mystery of this quiet. To relight the yuletide glow that's been dimmed.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1a_0.step5: Let's seek out someone who knows these lands. If Christmas cheer has faded, we'll rekindle it. After all, every frosty path leads to a warm hearth.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step1: Greetings, friend! We're strangers to this island and seek to understand its muted cheer.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step2: Welcome, travelers. I've awaited your arrival. Christmas Island's joy has been locked away, and we need your aid to release it. Awake the toy factory we must.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step3: We're here to help. What's the first step to reviving the factory and the cheer?
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer0a_0.step4: Patience, for now, just finding the factory through the frost is where your quest begins...
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2a_0.step1: Well done on crafting the toys. Now, take these Christmas bells. Their chimes are imbued with the power to revive the Christmas workshop.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2a_0.step2: Revive the workshop with these bells? Sounds like a melody that could awaken more than just a building.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2a_0.step3: Exactly. Ring them there and you'll unlock wreaths essential for restoring the island's Yuletide.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2a_0.step4: To the workshop, then. We'll bring the sound of joy and the spirit of Christmas back to every corner of this island.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_00.step1: Look at this place, it's like a Christmas postcard... but faded.  The skating rink lies quiet, longing for laughter and life. Everything's under a spell of stillness.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_00.step2: It's not just the rink. The entire island feels like it's in a deep winter slumber. The Starlight Tower, Santa's Sled... all dimmed.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_00.step3: We must awaken these symbols of Yuletide joy. Each one restored brings us closer to the heart of the island's cheer.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_00.step4: And the crowning jewel of our quest, the snowglobe. It's said to hold the essence of Christmas spirit.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_00.step5: Then let's begin. One by one, we'll bring light and mirth back to these landmarks, building up to the grand revival of the snowglobe.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1b_0.step1: We've made progress with the Christmas sites, but there's still a shadow over the island. We need more wreaths.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1b_0.step2: True, the wreaths are key, but they're in short supply. How do we find more to light up every corner?
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1b_0.step3: I've heard about a local penguin, guardian of lanterns that once brightened the entire island.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1b_0.step4: Perhaps he can help us.Lanterns and wreaths? There might be a connection. If we can assist him, maybe he'll provide the extra wreaths we need.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer1b_0.step5: Let's seek out this penguin then. Finding him might just be the solution to bringing Christmas Island back to life.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproduct0b_0.step1: We've found the penguin, and he's agreed to help with the wreaths. But there's a catch.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproduct0b_0.step2: A catch? What does he need?
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproduct0b_0.step3: His lanterns, the source of the wreaths' magic, won't glow without toys. It seems we have another task at the toy factory.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproduct0b_0.step4: Toys to power lanterns? That's a twist I didn't expect. But if that's what it takes to bring back the island's cheer, we're on it.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproduct0b_0.step5: Back to the factory, then. We've got some toy-making magic to do. Let's light up this island, one toy at a time.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2b_0.step1: We've got the lantern. It's glowing warmly in my hands, almost as if it's alive with holiday spirit.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2b_0.step2: The penguin said to take this to the bakery. Apparently, its light can rekindle the ovens there.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2b_0.step3: A lantern to light an oven? This island's magic is as whimsical as it is wonderful.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmproducer2b_0.step4: Let's head to the bakery then. If lighting these ovens is the key to more wreaths, we're on the right path.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_0.step1: Look, the snow globe. It's beautiful but dim, like a dream half-remembered.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_0.step2: This is more than just a decoration; it's a symbol of the island's heart. Restoring it could be key to reviving the entire Christmas spirit.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_0.step3: It seems dormant, waiting for a touch of magic to come alive again. We have our work cut out for us.
xmas_quests_json.Quest.xmcustomermain5_0.step4: Let's gather what's needed to rekindle its light. The brighter it shines, the more hope it spreads across the island.
